General.Name: Yanaprima Hastapersada Tbk
General.Description: PT Yanaprima Hastapersada Tbk engages in the manufacture and sale of polypropylene (PP) and BOPP laminated woven bags in Indonesia, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Plastic Bags, Cement Bags, Roll Sheet and Sandwich Sheet, and Others. It provides cement bags, block-bottom bags, laminated woven bags, resin bags, and PP woven fabrics for packing semi-finished products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Yanaprima Hastapersada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Hastagraha Bumipersada.
General.Address: Gedung Graha Irama, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950
